stories.title: UK inflation rate falls to 0.5%
stories.summary: The inflation rate dropped sharply to 0.5% in December, its joint lowest on record, as petrol prices fell Full article UK inflation rate falls to 0.5%

stories.title: Facebook restricts violent videos
stories.summary: Facebook has begun placing warnings over videos posted to its site, stating their contents might "shock, offend and upset" if viewed.

stories.title: Snow and gales bring disruption to UK
stories.summary: Wintry weather is causing disruption across parts of the UK, with warnings of high winds for much of the west and the north.
